entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add AsStream extensions for memory and text-based types. #82801
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IRandom interface (which System.Random and Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator implement) #82799
  • MissingMethodException: set_Encoder on JsonSerializationOptions #82798
  • Support macOS to Windows OS cross-DAC #82796
    8.0.0
  • [8.0-preview2] error MSB4012: The expression "CompileListCount=@(_ReadyToRunCompileList->Count())" cannot be used in this context #82795
  • [Mono] Hot reload: Add support for editing members of generic types #82792
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Hot Reload: Add support for updating generic methods #82791
    8.0.0
  • Create nuget package for WASI-SDK #82788
  • Create a user-friendly design for feature switches #82783
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ReservedFrameType_Throws #82772
    8.0.0
  • QUIC failures on linux #82771
  • [TestFailure] Listener_BacklogLimitRefusesConnection_ParallelClients_ClientThrows_Slow fails on ARM #82769
    8.0.0
  • can system.text.json serialize a number property with a attribute to set number precision or digit length #82774
  • Idle application dies of OOM on Ubuntu 22.04 on .NET 7.0.2+ #82763
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions from peephole optimization of removing mov instruction #82776
  • Problem with debugging WASM #82777
    8.0.0
  • Code in CoreLib defeating resource string optimization #82759
    8.0.0
  • JIT: it is difficult to do flow analysis on inlinees #82755
    8.0.0
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .NET 7 during GC #82753
  • `System.AccessViolationException` caused by combination of `AssemblyBuilder`, `GC.TryStartNoGCRegion`, and `GC.Collect` #82746
    8.0.0

Closed

  • SafeHandle marshalling broken with Mono #82308
  • profiler.multiple failing on MacOS 12.0 #64765
    8.0.0
  • What is the C# equivalent code for the Powershell sript to remove user from Adminstrators group? #82726
  • Unexpected ToString call upon adding item to dictionary #82784
  • System NuGet packages not up to date? #82770
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates code with pointer type in generic #82504
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] CI failure in JIT.Methodical.eh tests run in Browser wasm Release AllSubsets_Mono_RuntimeTests #81388
  • [7.0] Test failure in JIT_HardwareIntrinsics._X86_Fma_Vector256_Fma_r_Fma_r_._X86_Fma_Vector256_Fma_r_Fma_r_sh() #82632
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Test failure in JIT_HardwareIntrinsics._X86_Sse2_LoadLow_ro_LoadLow_ro_._X86_Sse2_LoadLow_ro_LoadLow_ro_sh() #82633
    7.0.x
  • support simple pattern matching, start with %2 to &1 #5844
    Future
  • .NET Core Path.GetFileName inconsistent with full framework #82760
  • Bogus `OperationCanceledException` raised by `StreamPipeReader` read methods #82594
  • `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` empty `Content.Headers.ContentLength` when using `AutomaticDecompression` #82737
  • System.Text.Json deserialization failure when published app is trimmed #82761
  • Library and Tools Subset build times regression (50+% increase) #82583
    8.0.0
  • Is it okay if I replace the current DebugProvider used by System.Diagnostics.Debug in my .NET Core application? #82758
  • Cast exception in ImmutableCollections.DoNotCallToImmutableCollectionOnAnImmutableCollectionValueAnalyzer on Preview 1 SDK #82741

PullRequests

Created

  • Use output size helpers for cryptographic primitives #82800
    area-System.Security
  • Implement load_assembly delegate for hosting API #82797
    area-Host
  • Add MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(string, Index/Range) #82794
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe lock implementation #82790
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fix ReservedFrameType_Throws #82787
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Move networking code to debugger component #82785
    area-Debugger-mono
  • disable SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose also on Catalyst #82782
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #82781
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Disable failing test on arm machines #82780
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Enable interlocked profiling for basic block counts too #82775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • update types mentioned in comment to match method #82768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser] delete unused mono_wasm_* functions #82767
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove JTRUE(relop) invariant in the backend #82766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping by using ref-oriented approach #82765
    area-System.Memory
  • Unify Array enumerators between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #82751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introducing ValidateOptionsResultBuilder #82749
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary relinking when publishing a blazor project for AOT #82748
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace for mono #82376
  • Tweak IndexOfAnyValues.TryGetSingleRange #82786
  • [wasm] Implement partial backward branch support in the Jiterpreter #82756
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName #82754
    area-System.Reflection
  • Rewrite exception handler if retval is a pointer #82740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-preview2] Versions.props: Increment package versions for 6.0, and 7.0 #82735
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Workloads
  • JIT: Revise DFS RPO computation #82752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preserve OCE.CancellationToken in StreamPipeReader #82745
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [class] DIMs in the vtable of abstract classes may be overridden #82556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Correct "abstact" to "abstract". #82738
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser] add test of download re-try into advanced sample #82722
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [jiterp] Remove write barrier from ldelem_ref #82757
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Stop incrementing class profile counter once the reservoir table is full #82723
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Trim managed debugging support code #82696
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for skipping workloads testing for previous versions #82742
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Workloads
  • Bump main PreReleaseVersionIteration to 3 #82658
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Support raw ECDH key agreements #82551
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • update Alpine image #82660
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Upstream workload fixes from 7.0 #82069
    area-Workloads
  • Annotation changes only (part 3) #82697
  • [wasm] Add an internal GC lock API #82646
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use SecurityTransforms for RSA+PSS #82728
    area-System.Security, os-ios, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Track down analyzer failure 2 #82734
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-codeflow
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after download retry #82617
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where caller requires no initialization #82711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [browser][icu][libraries] Load full ICU in library tests only when it's necessary #82619
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Try skipping generation of empty method dictionaries #82591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use windows.vs2022.amd64.open for stress tests #82736
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] Smoke tests for node on runtime pipeline #78769
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Handle the remainder in MemoryExtensions.Count vectorized #82687
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Pass wasi invariant mode through env variable #82707
    arch-wasm
  • [wasi] Don't provision wasmtime on CI #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll #82618
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add project id to rude edit telemetry #67113
  • Implement EnC support for Primary Constructors #67108
  • Implement EE support for Primary Constructors #67107
  • Unify the way MethodCompiler gets synthesized lowered method bodies #67104
  • Finalize naming strategy for Primary Constructor parameters backing fields #67103
  • Setting ProvideCommandLineArgs to the Csc/Vbc task includes non-Csc args #67102
  • UnitTests.Semantics.BinaryOperators test failure on Fedora rawhide #67101
  • Primary constructor parameter assignment in initializers uses wrong nullable warning #67099
  • C# compilation fails: Process terminated. System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException #67091
  • Property pattern block doesn't format well in else if #67090
  • Completions should not show `Obsolete` items with `error` set to `true` #67089
  • AnalyzerDriver should not capture cancellation token #67084

Closed

  • ExplicitType and target-typed new #42554
    Backlog
  • Keyword color for u8 identifier is broken in VS 17.5 Preview 3 #66507
  • Type inference should be able to infer U? for T when T? (and inference differs when a discard is used) #50782
    Backlog
  • Intellisense: Suggested type after new does not include array type #42441
    Backlog
  • Add VB option to control whether completion auto-shows in completion lists #42369
    Backlog
  • IDE0260 recommends switching to invalid pattern #67010
  • Executing `prop` snippet after accessibility modifier throws exception #67053
  • Expand scope for Add Null Checks and Add Null Checks for All Parameters #41140
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33427.682 #67088
  • Visual Basic: "Object initialization can be simplified (IDE0017)" wrong indent with custom tab/indent size #66071
    Backlog
  • Convert to raw string doesn't offer to change semantics if there is only whitespace at the end of the string #61267
    17.6 P3
  • Searching for a type or method in solution explorer shows multiple references #41836
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use CallStackWindow icon for StackTrace Explorer menu button #67112
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #67111
    Area-Compilers
  • Delay ref safety analysis of placeholder replacements #67110
    Area-Compilers
  • Address remaining PROTOTYPE comments #67109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • link isexternalinit to avoid errors in O# about missing reference #67106
    Area-IDE
  • Update PDB behavior for 'using alias to type', and add EE and PDB tests. #67105
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • Avoid delegate allocations in IExtensionManagerExtensions #67100
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid large object heap allocations in classification #67098
    Area-IDE
  • Do not offer `string` afer `ref/readonly` inside namespace member declaration #67097
    Area-IDE
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers
  • Thread cancellationToken instead of capturing it in delegates #67087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Sort unimported items from System.* ahead of other unimported items #67083
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix utf8 classification #67096
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue in 'use pattern matching' #67047
    Next
  • Update LSIF generator to latest bin log reader #67085
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Fix crash of property snippets after accessibility modifier #67054
    Community, Next
  • Disable EnC for more Primary Constructors scenarios #67026
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Improve the spans that 'add parameter check' is supported in #67004
    Next
  • Bump up priority for formatting analyzer #67093
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Improve 'convert regular to raw-string' for common cases (like test code). #67060
    Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Improve the caching logic in OOP DiagnosticComputer #67068
    Tenet-Performance, Performance-Scenario-Responsiveness, Next
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract remote keep-alive code into its own component #67073
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude CSharp.EditorFeature from vs_perf_designtime_ide_searchtest #67076
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #67114
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix VisualStudioSettingsOptionPersister issues and increase test coverage #67064
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Removed "sealed" from base class #64983
    Area-IDE
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • use Path.Combine to avoid using platform specific path seperators #67066
    Community
  • Update tests to use raw strings #67059
  • Fix crash of type snippets after accessibility modifier #67055
    Community
  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • Port Rename and Formatting tests to the new framework #67020
  • Don't show expanded items in certain scenarios #67049

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Official builds failing due to binlog2sln issue #46942
  • PlatformNotSupported exceptions in WindowsARM infrastructure for release/6.0 #46941
  • AppName.styles.css file has incorrect b- class identifiers #46940
  • FeatureCollection can throw NRE with structs #46939
  • Cannot wrap/override default IModelBinderFactory implementation #46938
  • Blazor Sections API Proposal #46937
    8.0-preview3
  • ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using both [Http*] and [Route] attributes #46936
  • SignalR - Connect - Response 404 No Connection with that ID - No Scaling #46929
  • [Java client] OkHttp 3 has vulnerabilities that are fixed in OkHttp4 #46926
  • Blazor @Key parameter causes control focus to be lost on mobile / touch devices #46924
  • Add parameterless overload for `RequireCors` API #46922

Closed

  • WebAuthn API Support #46858
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext, plaintext #46814
  • Perf improvement: https #46913
  • Perf regression: mapaction #46914
  • Problem with conuming blazor server custom element through another webApp! #46531
  • InputSelect doesn't honor the required attribute #46890
  • [RDG] Share indentation context for emitted strings #46643
    8.0-preview3
  • SignalR test failures in release/6.0 #46651

PullRequests

Created

  • Update sourceIndexPackageVersion #46946
    area-infrastructure
  • SSR as library #46935
    area-blazor
  • Update TryParse code gen to use CodeWriter. #46928
    area-runtime
  • Add TryParse support for route parameters. #46921
    area-runtime
  • Add explicit reference to `Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces` in HealthChecks #46920

Merged

  • Revert "Update SDK (#46919)" #46943
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Update template spelling and wording #46886
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview3
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23127.4 #46919
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Add support for indented text writer to RDG #46845
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
  • Tidy up some irregularities in certificate reloading #46819
    area-runtime
  • Avoid trying to use _hotReloadAgent variable before it is initialized #46916
    area-blazor
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2124766 #46893
    area-mvc
  • Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #46910
    area-signalr
  • Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #46769
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Correct a few nullable annotations #46911
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Source-build: Allow setting KnownAppHostPack and KnownRuntimePack #46735
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Make images accessible only if Semantics have been applied #13609
  • ImageButton doesn't scale the Image when it's loaded from resource #13608
  • MaximumWidthRequest in FlexLayout is not working on macOS M1/M2 #13604
    Backlog
  • macOS map clicked event fires when tap on pin #13603
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #13600
  • SecureStorage throws InvalidProtocolBufferException on some devices #13597
    Backlog
  • DragGestureRecognizer should allow to point to another view as placeholder view #13596
    Backlog

Closed

  • Can't get started #13500
  • Missing sourceLocation metadata in assemblies when debug on iOS Platform #13548
  • [Android] Unable to change App.MainPage inside OnResume() #10024
    Backlog
  • Image does not get cleared when its Source is set to null #10165
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Grid.Children missing Add convenience methods #780
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Where is Install.ps1 ? #13595
  • Scrollview stops working with a margin set on 1st element #7186

PullRequests

Created

  • Set a GroupName when creating new WinUI RadioButtons #13611
  • Bugfix for text not properly aligned with radioButton when in RTL for Android #13610
    area/controls 🎮
  • Backport yaml changes and update GitInfo #13607
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix test runner issues around our stubbed windows #13536
    backport/suggested
  • [housekeeping] Bump to 7.0.201 #13589
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Remove omnisharp.sln and use solution filter for mac #13605
  • Add area label to formatting PRs #13606
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Backport yaml changes to net7.0 #13602
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Don't use fixed manifest version for Tizen #13601
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.0 to 4.1.2 #13598
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump to .NET 8 Preview 2 builds #13593
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13592
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add legacy Grid method (and a better one) #13408
    t/breaking 💥, area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `BindableLayout` #13550
    area/perf 🏎️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Ad_hoc_query_for_shared_type_entity_type_works doesn't quote identifiers #30367
  • SplitToTable with IsTemporal #30366
  • Each_property_gets_its_own_generator_with_seeding failed #30364
  • "Login failed for user '<token-identified principal>" when creating database in migration (at runtime) #30363
  • Should consider saving any type as text or JSON text. #30361

Closed

  • migrations bundles. #30348
  • HasQueryFilter on Relationship #30339
  • EntityTypeBuilder<T>.HasTrigger("My Trigger") #30324
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Internal.CSharpHelper' from assembly 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design, Version=6.0.7.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation #30308

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK & sourceindexpackageversion #30370
  • Port simple relationship scenarios from docs samples #30365

Merged

  • Revert "Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23127.4" #30368
  • Adding procedural test generation to test interactions between various operators. #30280
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23127.4 #30359
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30028 - Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30333
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Add back setter for scaffolded collection navigations #30343
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.5
